summary: A dramatization of George Washington's perilous gamble of crossing the Delaware River and attacking the Hessian forces at Trenton.
cast: Jeff Daniels|Roger Rees|Sebastian Roch√©|Steven McCarthy|John Henry Canavan|Ned Vukovic|David Ferry|Nigel Bennett|Karl Pruner|Duncan McLeod|Andrew Kraulis|Kelly Harms|Jonathan Watton|Kris Holden-Ried|Chris Williamson|Paul Brogren|Robert Persichini|Peter Cockett|Michael Proudfoot|Tim Post|Julian Richings|Shaun Austin-Olsen|Paulette Sinclair|Donald Ewer|James Kidnie|John Watson|Christopher Crumb|Michael Frolick|Mary Pirie|Cliff Saunders|Rick Parker|Kassandra Marr|Dennis Nicomede|Hamish Robertson|Stefen Rollpiller|Kevin Windsor|Shawn Connell|Jason Leduc|Jason McMaster|Craig Michaels|Daniel Shaw
title: George Washington: La leyenda
